scripts.a11y:axe: npm run build && start-server-and-test "vite preview --host 127.0.0.1 --port 4173" http://127.0.0.1:4173 "axe http://127.0.0.1:4173/#/ http://127.0.0.1:4173/#/privacy --exit"
scripts.a11y:lighthouse: npm run build && start-server-and-test "vite preview --host 127.0.0.1 --port 4173" http://127.0.0.1:4173 "lhci collect --config=./lighthouserc.json && lhci assert --config=./lighthouserc.json"
